description_short: Machine learning model for classifying iris flowers into three species
description: This model classifies iris flowers into one of three species (setosa, versicolor, or virginica) based on sepal and petal measurements. It uses the classic iris dataset and provides accurate species prediction based on morphological features.

inputs.name: sepal_length
inputs.label: Sepal Length (cm)
inputs.description: Length of the iris sepal in centimeters

inputs.name: sepal_width
inputs.label: Sepal Width (cm)
inputs.description: Width of the iris sepal in centimeters

inputs.name: petal_length
inputs.label: Petal Length (cm)
inputs.description: Length of the iris petal in centimeters

inputs.name: petal_width
inputs.label: Petal Width (cm)
inputs.description: Width of the iris petal in centimeters

outputs.name: species
outputs.label: Predicted Species
outputs.description: The predicted iris species: setosa, versicolor, or virginica
